name: Jupyter Notebook with MongoDB
updateContentCommand: bash -c 'source /opt/python-env/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt'
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'source /opt/python-env/bin/activate && python -m ipykernel install --user --name=python3 --display-name="Python 3 (Project)" && python -m ipykernel install --sys-prefix --name=python3 --display-name="Python 3 (Project)" && jupyter kernelspec list'
postStartCommand: bash -c 'source /opt/python-env/bin/activate && python -m ipykernel install --user --name=python3 --display-name="Python 3 (Project)" && jupyter kernelspec list'
